tuv.seg: Sources of information on returning to education
Foinsí eolais maidir le filleadh ar oideachas
There is a range of options and information available to people who are thinking of returning to education
Tá raon roghanna agus faisnéise ar fáil do dhaoine atá ag smaoineamh filleadh ar oideachas
This document gives an overview of the different types of education available to adults outside the school system
Soláthraíonn an doiciméad seo forbhreathnú ar na cineálacha éagsúla oideachais aosaigh atá ar fáil do dhaoine fásta lasmuigh den chóras scolaíochta
Back to Education Initiative
Tionscnamh um Fhilleadh ar Oideachas
Provides opportunities for adult learners and early school-leavers who want to upgrade their skills
Soláthraítear deiseanna do gach foghlaimeoir fásta agus gach luathfhágóir scoile ar mian leo a scileanna a uasghrádú
The adult literacy service provided by the 16 Educational and Training Boards aims to help adults with reading and writing difficulties
Déanann an cháipéis seo cur síos ar Scéim Litearthachta do Dhaoine Fásta an Choiste Ghairmoideachais, scéim a reachtáileann
There are a vast range of organisations offering evening and night classes throughout Ireland. Information regarding costs, application procedures and term times
Tá cur síos sa gcáipéis seo ar an réimse eagraíochtaí a chuireann ranganna oíche ar fáil, agus eolas maidir le costaisí iarratais agus na téarmaí ina mbíonn na cúrsaí ar siúl
Community education is adult education and lifelong learning which is based in the community, generally outside the formal education sector
Is é atá in oideachas pobail ná oideachas aosach agus foghlaim fadsaoil atá lonnaithe sa phobal, taobh amuigh d'earnáil an oideachais fhoirmiúla de ghnáth
Vocational Training Opportunities Scheme
Scéim Deiseanna Oiliúna Gairmoideachais
The VTOS scheme offers education and training courses for jobseekers and others getting certain social welfare payments
Is éard atá sa scéim seo réimse cúrsaí oideachais agus oiliúna atá feiliúnach do dhaoine fásta dífhostaithe agus do dhaoine eile a fhaigheann íocaíochtaí leasa shóisialaigh ar leith
Back to Education Allowance
Liúntas um Fhilleadh ar Oideachas
The Back to Education Allowance Scheme helps people who are unemployed, are getting a One-Parent Family Payment or have a disability, to attend approved second-or third-level education courses
Tá an Scéim Liúntas um Fhilleadh ar Oideachas dírithe orthu atá dífhostaithe, ag fáil Íocaíocht Teaghlaigh Aontuismitheora nó tá míchumas orthu chun cúrsaí dara nó tríú leibhéil ceadaithe a dhéanamh
This document is in: Social Welfare > Social welfare payments > Back to Education
This document is in: Leas Sóisialach > Íocaíochtaí Leasa Shóisialaigh > Filleadh ar Oideachas
Most Read in "Education and Training"
Ábhar is mó éilimh i "Oideachas agus Oiliúint"
School terms in primary and post-primary schools
Téarmaí scoile i mbunscoileanna agus iarbhunscoileanna
Further Education and Training (FET) allowances
Liúntais Bhreisoideachais agus Oiliúna (BOO)
